title: Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
body: RIOT PLEASE GIVE MORE INFO ON HOW TO FIX "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." THE LOGS ON MAC DONT TELL ME ANYTHING ABOUT HOW TO FIX THIS PROBLEM! AND NONE OF THE FORUMS OR WEBSITES TELL ME ANYTHING EITHER! PLEASE HALP!!!!!

replies.body:
The logs are not meant to be understand by the user. Only dialogs are.

Did you try the DNS trick?
Could you please provide the logs, normally they contain technical information that can help debug the issue.
